name: StigmaSimulator
description:
MAKE SURE YOU HIT THE FULLSCREEN BUTTON OR YOU WON'T GET THE FULL EXPERIENCE. ENJOY.

How to Play:

  • Press the Jump button to attempt to jump.
  • Try to ignore what the your able-jumping peers say to help.

Hey man, where are the screenshots?

This is a very short, tongue-in-cheek social commentary. The addition of screenshots will spoil the overall experience of the "game".

This took me a couple hours in Unity3D and Blender to create. Any critism you have towards the game or myself are probably warranted, and will be ignored.

Ctrl-F "Download" to find the Download link, it's somewhere here.
